Address.label: Address
Address.value: 150 ALHAMBRA CIRCLE,SUITE 1200, CORAL GABLES, Florida, 33134, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Dolphin Entertainment Inc is an entertainment marketing and content production company. It provides strategic marketing and publicity services to many of the top brands, both individual and corporate, in the film, television, music, gaming and hospitality industries. Viewpoint Creative and Be Social complement the efforts with full-service creative branding and production capabilities as well as social media and influencer marketing services. Dolphin's legacy content production business has produced multiple feature films and award-winning digital series.
